entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
